Text: Re Local Production July Cc Carol Can you help me with the below information I am looking to turn over our local production After August we wont be in business anymore and this local production that is in our name is really Enron North Americas local production I had suggested that Enron Chris Germany set up a local agg pool or if he was selling it to someone else to let me know so that we can turn this production over ASAP I am looking to write a letter to Peoples to give them formal intent and need to know if I need to include meter identification numbers in the letter currently I do not know what these numbers are I apologize for this being such a mess but I have been trying to get this cleared up and seem to have no luck Thanks again for your help cc Subject Local Production July Hi Karen Please nominate a volume of dths for the month of July for CES local production Please let me know if you need something more from me I understand that Clinton Energy is setting up a pool and will soon be able to take over our local production I will be sending in a letter soon relinquishing the local production is there a meter number or identification number that I will need to mention in the letter Thanks Heidi Boyd
NYSEG guys I am looking for NYSEG TCO gas I believe the correct Op area etc is as follows Op Mkt MLI I need approximately dthday for Thanks
Re O on AM Please respond to To Heidi OLUMBIAGAS cc Brian Perrone NOTESbperronLMSOV Subject OR I hear we are staying at for tomorrow at OR

Re NYSEG and NIMO Cc not know the meter number I just know the OP area and Mkt area I am not aware of the MLI as I did not anticipate working from home I did not bring my chart with me Please look it up NYSEG Op Mkt the mli will be listed if you look up NYSEG in Op Mkt Joann could help you with this if you all dont have access to this chartinfo Thanks Brian Perrone AM To Heidi olumbiaGas cc Subject Re NYSEG and NIMO What is the meter Heidi Boyd AM To Brian olumbiaGas cc Subject NYSEG and NIMO Hey guys Just wanted to confirm that that NIMO gas East Meter and actually just to the West Meter was purchased through the EOM ALSO At NYSEG I need to purchase TCO dthday from to to send to Mkt I believe that it is Op Mkt please check with Joann Collins to double check that Op area I dont have my chart with me Please let me know ASAP Thanks

NYSEG and NIMOguys Just wanted to confirm that that NIMO gas East Meter and actually just to the West Meter was purchased through the EOM ALSO At NYSEG I need to purchase TCO dthday from to to send to Mkt I believe that it is Op Mkt please check with Joann Collins to double check that Op area I dont have my chart with me Please let me know ASAP Thanks
Re NYSEG dths on AM Please respond to To Heidi OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re NYSEG Im forgot what do you need at Tenn OR for tomorrow
Re NYSEG sorry on AM Please respond to To Heidi OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re NYSEG Im forgot what do you need at Tenn OR for tomorrow

Re NYSEG thank you so much on AM Please respond to To Brian Perrone NOTESbperronLMSOV Heidi OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re NYSEG We will deliver dth to Tenn NYSEG meter on contract at first of the month prices Also we are selingl you the dth of CNG delivered at for the rest of the month

Re NYSEG Cc Chris From what Ive been hearing I can only get it one day at a time I need the gas from if you can get it Thanks on AM Please respond to To Heidi OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re NYSEG How many days do you need this CNG Nimo gas

Email testingChris I was hoping youd be available via email today This is a test for now If this does get through to you I want to purchase an additional each for the Nimo East pool and NIMO West pool I need the gas Thanks Heidi

NYSEG Cc Everybody NYSEG TGP dth for I need this gas even if you have to go out and purchase it Thank you If you need to forward this email to Chris Germany so that he may purchase the gas please do so I tried to copy him but am not sure that I have his email address correct Thanks TCO was now Thanks
